files.patch:
@@ -61,0 +61,1 @@
+  // sscanf, using %m, will return malloced memory. Need raw ::free, not os::free.
@@ -65,1 +66,0 @@
-    // sscanf, using %m, will return malloced memory. Need raw ::free, not os::free.
@@ -70,1 +70,1 @@
-  ALLOW_C_FUNCTION(::free, ::free(line_filesystem);) // *not* os::free
+  ALLOW_C_FUNCTION(::free, ::free(line_filesystem);)
